price: Bityo, kubera ibyo bavuze, Allah yabagororeye ubusitani butembamo imigezi (Ijuru), bakazabubamo ubuziraherezo. Kandi iyo ni yo ngororano y’abakora ibyiza.
arabic: فَأَثَٰبَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا قَالُواْ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fa-athābahumu al-lahu bimā qālū jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wadhālika jazāu al-muḥ'sinīna
